sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import GlobalSearch from '../components/common/GlobalSearch'; import ExportButton from '../components/common/ExportButton'; import { exportAPI } from '../services/api'; import { getExportParams } from '../utils/exportUtils'; const Dashboard = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.clear(); sessionStorage.clear(); window.location.href = '/login'; }; const getDashboardContent = () => { switch (user.role) { case 'student': return (

Student Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! You can monitor classes and rate lectures here.

Monitoring

View class reports and attendance records

Rating

Rate lectures and provide feedback to lecturers

{/* Quick Stats */}
Quick Access
{/* Export Section */}
Data Export

Download your data for offline analysis

exportAPI.reports(getExportParams(user))} filename="my-class-reports" buttonText="Export Class Reports" variant="success" /> exportAPI.ratings(user.faculty)} filename="lecture-ratings" buttonText="Export Ratings" variant="info" className="ms-2" />
); case 'lecturer': return (

Lecturer Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Manage your classes and reports.

Classes

Manage your classes

Reports

Submit teaching reports

Monitoring

Monitor student attendance

Rating

View your ratings

{/* Quick Stats */}
Quick Actions
{/* Export Section */}
Data Export

Export your teaching data for reporting

exportAPI.reports(getExportParams(user))} filename="my-teaching-reports" buttonText="Export My Reports" variant="success" />
); case 'principal_lecturer': return (

Principal Lecturer Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Oversee courses and provide feedback in the {user.faculty} stream.

Courses

View all courses & lectures under your stream

Reports

View lecture reports & add feedback

Monitoring

Monitor academic performance

Rating

View ratings and feedback

{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
{/* Export Section */}
Data Export

Export faculty data for analysis

exportAPI.reports(getExportParams(user))} filename="faculty-reports" buttonText="Export Reports" variant="success" /> exportAPI.ratings(user.faculty)} filename="faculty-ratings" buttonText="Export Ratings" variant="info" className="ms-2" />
); case 'program_leader': return (

Program Leader Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Manage programs, courses, and lecturer assignments.

Courses

Add courses & assign lecture modules

Reports

View reports from PRL

Lecturers

Manage lecturer assignments

Classes

Manage class structures

{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
{/* Export Section */}
Data Export

Export comprehensive program data

); default: return (
Loading...

Loading your dashboard...

); } }; return (
{/* Header with Search */}

LUCT Reporting System

{user.role?.replace('_', ' ')}
{/* Global Search */}
Welcome, {user.name}
{getDashboardContent()}
); }; export default Dashboard;
